div.l: For cristes sawle and here a noble game
For by þat lord þat called is seint Iame
As I haue þries in þis shorte nyght
Swyfed þe Melleres doughter bolt vp right
Whil þow hast as a coward ben agast
Ye false harlot qduod þe Mellere hast
A fals traytour fals Clerc qduod he
Thow shalt be deed by goddes dignite
Who durste be so bold to disparage
Mi doughter þat is comen of such lynage
And by the throte bolle he caught Alayn
And he hent him dispytously agayn
And on þe nose he smote him with his fiste
Down ranne þe blody streme vppon his briste
And in þe flore with nose ⁊and mouth to broke
Þei walowe as doth two pigges in a poke
And vp þei gon and down̄ agayn a noon
Til þat þe Mellere spurned at a ston
And down he fel bakward vppon his wif
That wist no thing of this Nice strif
For she was falle a slepe a lityl wight
Wit Iohn þe clerk þat waked hadde al þᵉ nyght
And wit þe falle out of hire slepe she brayde
Help holi cros of Bromholm she saide
In manꝰus tuas lord to þe I calle
A wak symond þe fend is on me falle
Myn herte is broken help I nam but dede
Þere lith oon vp my wombe and vp myn hede
Help Symkyn for þe fals clerkes fighte
Þis Iohn starte vp as faste as eủere he mighte
And graspede bi þe walles to and froo
To fynden a staf and she stert vp also
And knew þe estris bet þan ded þat Iohn
And bi þe walle a staf she fond a noon
And saugh a litel shymering of a light
For at an hole In shone þe mone bright
And bi þat light she saugh hem boþe two
But sykerly she nyste ho was who
But as she saugh a whight þing in hyre eye
And whan she gan þis whighte þing aspye
She wende þe clerk hadde wered a volipere
